name: Olukai Nalukai Sandals - Men's
description: Nalukai in Hawaiian means 'to be weathered by the storms of life'. These sandals help you face any storm head on.Burnished full-grain leather straps.Soft microfibre lining.Soft fabric toe thong reduces the chance of blisters.Anatomical PU footbed offers all-day support.Non-marking outsole.A portion of all proceeds supports the Ama OluKai Foundation, honouring those who preserve and celebrate the cultural heritage and Aloha spirit of Hawai‘i.
